targetLine.text: Look... William McFly and family. Your relatives?
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part III

contextBefore.text: Just a minute. "However, this claim cannot be substantiated since precise records were not kept after Tannen shot a newspaper editor after printing an unfavorable story about him in 1884." That's why we can't find anything.

contextAfter.text: My great-grandfather's name was William. That's him. Good looking guy.
Look, Doc, maybe it was a mistake. Maybe that grave wasn't yours. There could've been another Emmett Brown back in 1885. Did you have any relatives here back then?

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
